/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern apartment buildings, their gray and white facades reflecting the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the apartment buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
